name: Shar3 (WIP)
summary: Desktop app for easily sharing your folders and files temporarily with a QR code or url. Works inside and outside of your local network!

name: FastChat
summary: An easy and fast solution to avoid needing to add contacts before writing to them through WhatsApp. You are able to install the tool as an app (PWA) in your mobile devices.

name: Spotifyrics
summary: It is a small desktop app developed with React and Electron, allowing you to control your Spotify client and display real-time lyrics depending on the song you are listening to without logging in.
